properties.areaDesc: Dyer, TN; Obion, TN; Gibson, TN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 7:33PM CST until January 16 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Obion River...S.F. of the Forked
Deer River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Obion River near Obion
* from Monday January 13 until Wednesday January 15.
* At 7 PM Sunday the stage was 32.8 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 35.0 feet on Tuesday January 14.
* Flood stage is 34.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Monday January 13 and
continue to rise to near 35.0 feet by Tuesday January 14.The river
will fall below flood stage by Wednesday January 15.
* At 35.0 feet...Several secondary roads and large areas of farm land
are flooded in northern Dyer County. Flooding is occurring around
Rives in southeast Obion County.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
